title: WINDOWS XP PRO SP3 BUILD 5508 VISTA EDITION CUSTOM Prophet07
description:
WINDOWS XP PRO SP3 BUILD 5508 VISTA EDITION CUSTOM Prophet07


Dam! were do I start with the details..This is a FULL custom XP disk, Over 500 files
have been changed to comply with Vista..

TYPE.........: WINDOWS XP PRO SP3 CUSTOM (OPERATING SYSTEM)
VALIDATION...: RAR/SFV
TIME SPENT...: 1 WEEK IN TOTAL (43 INSTALLS VIA VMWARE)
SIZE OF ISO..: 680 MEGS

(THIS IS A GUI ATTENDED INSTALLER)
==========START OF GUI==========

GUI Attended

1) Regional & Language Options
2) Personalize Your Software
3) Local: Time
4) Network Settings

===========END OF GUI===========
(USER INPUT IS NEEDED AS ABOVE)

(PROGRAMS INTERGRATED INTO THE XP INSTALL)

FIREFOX V2.0.0.13
DAEMON TOOL V4.12.1
GSPOT V2.70a
IMGBURN V2.4.1.0
IE V7.0.5730.13
SPYBOT S&D V1.5.2
UNLOCKER V1.8.5
WMP V11.0.5721.5145
DVD DECRYPTOR V3.5.4.0
VISTA SOUNDS PACK V1.0
WINXP SIDEBAR ADDON (ALKY) V1.1

(SP3 BUILD 5508 PRE INTERGRATED)

(INFO ON MODIFIED FILES)

The $OEM$ folders have been disabled so that F6 can be used in order to load sata
RAID drivers, All modified files have been added to the xp install directly..

(THEME USED AS A VISTA REPLACEMENT)

I decided NOT to use any of the mainstream Vista skin themes as they all used the
official Vista FONT&#039;s & this on XP made it look shit so I modified my own from one
already on the net..

(FINAL NOTE)

No languages or code page files have been removed so what ever was in there to begin
with is still there..
